content: I'm so excited to try all these dishes! I've heard of some of them before, but I've never had the chance to try them. I'll definitely make sure to try the adobo and lumpia, since I just learned how to make them from my grandma. Do you think I'll be able to find any food vendors selling Filipino desserts like halo-halo or maja blanca? I've heard they're really popular in the Philippines.
